subject: Re: [junit] Is it guaranteed that setUp will always run before a test method ?
msgSnippet: Hi, ... setUp is per TestCase, not per suite. Can you post a minimum example that shows the problem? Robert -- Handyrechnung zu hoch? Tipp: SMS und MMS mit GMX

Hi,
 
> When running 
> through the suite, some tests fail because a variable which is 
> initialized in the setUp method has not been initialized yet. 
setUp is per TestCase, not per suite.

Can you post a minimum example that shows the problem?

Robert
